titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Herard von Santos M. interviews
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Hoover Institution Archives Staff.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2014-04-08T10:31-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: Added container list afer materials were opened.

did.unittitle: Herard von Santos M. interviews
did.abstract: Digital sound recordings and transcripts of interviews of former Salvadoran military officers and guerrillas, relating to guerrilla warfare and counterinsurgency operations in El Salvador in the 1970s and 1980s.

origination.label: Creator
origination.persname: Santos M., Herard von (Santos Méndez), 1966- , interviewer.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research. Use copies of all sound recordings available.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Herard von Santos M. interviews, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in .

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Digital sound recordings and transcripts of interviews of former Salvadoran military officers and guerrillas, relating to guerrilla warfare and counterinsurgency operations in El Salvador in the 1970s and 1980s.

controlaccess.corpname: Frente Farabundo Martí para la Liberación Nacional.
controlaccess.subject: Guerrillas--El Salvador.
